title: Train Fault affecting East West Line

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train service on the East-West Line has resumed. Free regular bus service has ceased.
[EWL] UPDATE: Train services on the East-West Line are progressively returning to normal. Free regular bus services between #OutramPark and #Bugis are still available.
[EWL] UPDATE: Train services on the East-West Line are progressively resumed.

[EWL] UPDATE: Due to a train fault, please add 25mins train travel time from #Queenstown to #Bugis towards #PasirRis. Free regular bus services between #OutramPark and #Bugis. We apologize for the delay to your journey.
[EWL]: Due to a train fault, please add 25mins train travel time from #OutramPark to #Bugis towards #PasirRis. Free regular bus services between #OutramPark and #Bugis.
[EWL] UPDATE: If you are near #Bugis, you may transfer to Downtown Line at #Bugis for alternative route.
[EWL] UPDATE: If you are near #BuonaVista and heading towards East, you may transfer to Circle Line at #BuonaVista to avoid the affected area.
[EWL]: Due to a train fault, please add 25mins train travel time from #OutramPark to #Bugis towards #PasirRis. Free regular bus services between #OutramPark and #Bugis. Our station staff will assist.
